# Installation

First you need to install virrvarr in your project.

# npm

npm install @ortelius/virrvarr

import Virrvarr from "@ortelius/virrvarr"

# unpkg cdn

<script src="https://unpkg.com/@ortelius/virrvarr/dist/bundle.js"></script>

Your first graph →
